name: ImageQuiz
tag_list: quiz, education, learning, image, picture, tool
overview: ImageQuiz allows you to use the power of images for fun and educational quizzes, entirely for free.. There are loads of image-based quizzes on the site, but even better you can make new quizzes quickly and simply on the site for yourself or to share with friends. There’s no requirement to create an account, but if you do you can track your scores and get your name on the scoreboard. ImageQuiz covers a vast array of subjects, from Geography to Music, and quizzes at all difficulty levels from primary through to post-grad education.
